member.summary: The date the entry was created.

member.summary: The prompt used for the entry.

member.summary: Creates a new journal entry with a prompt and user input.

member.summary: Returns a formatted string for display.

member.name: M:Entry.ToFileFormat
member.summary: Returns a string formatted for saving to a file.

member.summary: Parses an entry from a file-formatted string.

member.summary: Saves journal entries to a file.

member.summary: Loads journal entries from a file.

member.summary: Provides random prompts for journal entries.
